amendment.description: To allow the Bureau of Indian Education to apply for certain competitive grants under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2149 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2149 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Udall to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5095) To allow the Bureau of Indian Education to apply for certain competitive grants under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2149 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2149 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Udall to Amendment SA 2089.
